articles.title: Construction of a diagnostic model for tuberculosis based on long non-coding RNA.
articles.summary:
Here's a summary sentence focusing on the key finding:

Researchers developed a machine learning model using long non-coding RNAs to potentially improve tuberculosis diagnosis through non-sputum samples.

articles.title: Endobronchial ultrasound-guided mediastinal biopsies for the diagnosis of mediastinal diseases: A network meta-analysis.
articles.summary: A network meta-analysis shows endobronchial ultrasound-guided biopsies effectively diagnose mediastinal diseases, particularly in lung cancer staging.
